issue.title: Removing MAP2FOP service
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

MAP2FOP is a Java servlet which allow users printing maps from MAP component.
As MapFishPrint is now integrated inside MAP component, there is no reason to maintain such service.

Note: MAP2FOP was able to print data attributes through WFS getFeature method, what is not any more available with MapFishPrint...

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0
